snippet: Meet the Dublin-based photographer who shot our cover story for the Voyages Issue.
abstract: Meet the Dublin-based photographer who shot our cover story for the Voyages Issue.
lead_paragraph: Despite having made a living as a photographer for two decades, Kenneth O Halloran, who shot this week's cover story on Ireland by John Jeremiah Sullivan, says it was only a few years ago that he began to think of photography as more than a job.

headline.main: Kenneth O Halloran's Pictures of Ireland
